original_text: God gives some people a lot of money and valuable things. He helps them to enjoy those things and to be happy with their work. All of this is a gift from God. God gives some people a lot of money and valuable things. He helps them to enjoy those things and to be happy with their work. All of this is a gift from God. God gives some people a lot of money and valuable things. He helps them to enjoy those things and to be happy with their work. All of this is a gift from God. God gives some people a lot of money and valuable things. He helps them to enjoy those things and to be happy with their work. All of this is a gift from God.
korean_text: 또한 어떤 사람에게든지 하나님이 재물과 부요를 그에게 주사 능히 누리게 하시며 제 몫을 받아 수고함으로 즐거워하게 하신 것은 하나님의 선물이라

sentences.original_text: God gives some people a lot of money and valuable things.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 어떤 사람들에게 많은 돈과 귀한 것들을 주신다.

sentences.original_text: He helps them to enjoy those things
and to be happy with their work.
All of this is a gift from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것은 하나님으로부터 온 선물이다.
